message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Strong risk-on day led by financials. PSU and mid-tier banks outperformed (AUBANK, RBLBANK, INDIANB, CENTRALBK, UCO, IOB), many closing near day highs with heavy volumes. Select momentum in industrials/capital goods (POLYCAB, CUMMINSIND) and healthcare (LAURUSLABS, RADICO). Renewables mixed (KPIGREEN up, WAAREEENER down). Exchanges diverged (BSE steady, MCX weaker). Our portfolio benefited mainly from RBLBANK strength; no emergency actions needed ahead of Monday.",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "AUBANK",
      "signal": "Bullish breakout; buy on dip 850–855 or strength >872",
      "reason": "Wide-range +5.8% up day, close near high with top-tier volume; momentum continuation likely if 870 area clears convincingly.",
      "price": 865.2
    },
    {
      "symbol": "RBLBANK",
      "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on pullback 318–320 only",
      "reason": "Big +8% breakout on very high volume; avoid chasing. Trail stop ~308 to lock gains; consider partial add only on controlled dip.",
      "price": 326.65
    },
    {
      "symbol": "INDIANB",
      "signal": "Buy on strength >820 or retest 800–805",
      "reason": "+3.8% strong close with solid volume; PSU bank momentum breadth supports follow-through.",
      "price": 813.8
    },
    {
      "symbol": "INDUSTOWER",
      "signal": "Breakout watch >356.5",
      "reason": "+2.7% close near day high; clearing 356–357 could open room toward 370; manage risk below 343.",
      "price": 354.4
    },
    {
      "symbol": "RADICO",
      "signal": "Momentum buy above 3285",
      "reason": "High-volume +4% day from consolidation zone; follow-through possible if 3285 holds; risk below ~3170.",
      "price": 3254.7
    },
    {
      "symbol": "KPIGREEN",
      "signal": "Buy on dip 490–492",
      "reason": "Relative strength in renewables vs peers; constructive +2.9% day. Favor risk-defined entry on pullback; risk below 475.",
      "price": 496.6
    },
    {
      "symbol": "DELHIVERY",
      "signal": "Buy on strength >480",
      "reason": "Recovered from early weakness to close strong; trigger above 480 targets 500 area; risk below 466.",
      "price": 474.9
    },
    {
      "symbol": "POLYCAB",
      "signal": "Breakout continuation above 7700",
      "reason": "Strong recovery candle; a push through 7700 can extend trend; risk below 7510.",
      "price": 7673.5
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 2256.95,
    "total_value": 26237.2,
    "holdings_count": 5,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (Now 2494.10)",
      "RBLBANK: 20 units @ 295.55 (Now 326.65)",
      "LTF: 30 units @ 266.26 (Now 267.54)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 412.80 (Now 416.50)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05 (Now 920.65)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU/mid-tier banks strong breadth: CENTRALBK +4.5%, UCO +3.2%, IOB +3.2%, INDIANB +3.8%. Favor buying strength selectively on Monday; avoid chasing gap-ups.",
    "Our holdings: RBLBANK—trail stop ~308; consider booking 20–25% if Monday gaps >335 and fades. LTF—soft today; add only above 271; protect below 261. BEL—tight consolidation; alert on breakout above 418.5 with stop 408. LAURUSLABS—hold; trail ~898. BSE—steady; trail ~2425.",
    "Exchanges diverged: MCX fell -2.2% while BSE held; avoid MCX buys until it reclaims 9300 decisively.",
    "Renewables mixed: KPIGREEN showed RS; WAAREEENER -1.9% and SJVN soft—prefer KPIGREEN over peers for momentum.",
    "Industrials/capital goods constructive: POLYCAB near 7700 breakout; CUMMINSIND firm; KEI steady. Use strength triggers with tight risk.",
    "Healthcare/consumption: RADICO showed high-volume breakout; APOLLOHOSP/MANKIND steady; consider RADICO on strength only.",
    "Caution: POONAWALLA sold off intraday (closed -3.4% from open); avoid fresh buys until it stabilizes above 520.",
    "Monday watch-levels: AUBANK 850–855 buy-dip/SL 828; INDIANB >820 or 800–805 retest/SL 788; INDUSTOWER >356.5/SL 343; RADICO >3285/SL 3170; KPIGREEN 490–492/SL 475; DELHIVERY >480/SL 466; POLYCAB >7700/SL 7510.",
    "Position sizing: given small available cash, prefer no new entries until we rotate or get pullbacks; if a high-conviction trigger hits, consider trimming 10–20% RBLBANK on strength to fund a new position."
  ]
}
